text: jo log isake qaayal hain ki khuda teen mein ka (teesara) hai vah yaqeenan kaafir ho gae (yaad rakho ki) khudae yakata ke siva koee maabood nahin aur (khuda ke baare mein) ye log jo kuchh baka karate hain agar usase baaz na aae to (samajh rakho ki) jo log usamen se (kaafir ke) kaafir rah gae un par zaroor dardanaak azaab naazil hoga
